title: Complementary & herbal medicines
author: © Copyright Swissmedic
cleaned_text: Complementary and herbal medicines are very popular and widely used in Switzerland. These medicinal products can be authorised using a simplified procedure on the basis of the legislation governing therapeutic products in Switzerland and the Ordinance on Complementary and Herbal Medicinal Products (SR 812.212.24) in particular.
